name: capcaitor-phaser
description: Skeleton Phaser app build around Ionic Capacitor which allows deployment to Android, iOS and Desktop (via Electron)

scripts.build-android: webpack --mode production --env.android && npx cap copy android && npx cap open android
scripts.build-ios: webpack --mode production --env.ios && npx cap copy ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.build-electron: webpack --mode production --env.electron && npx cap copy electron
